snippet.title: Elroy and the Aliens: Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1082190/Elroy_And_The_Aliens/

Elroy And The Aliens is a hand-drawn classic point & click adventure game.

Elroy is a young rocket engineer whose father disappeared 18 years ago in suspicious circumstances.
Peggie is a hot shot reporter with a knack for languages, history and research.

Together, they uncover a secret that takes them on a journey of epic, world-saving proportions!

Features:
Classic point-and-click adventure game.
Story full of mystery, character development, ancient legends, alien language and occasional pop culture references.
Challenging puzzles.
Spanning 2 planets, 60 locations and featuring more than 60 characters.
Hand-drawn 2D animations.
Original music score.
Fully-voiced characters.

Official website: https://elroythegame.com
Twitter: https://twitter.com/ElroyTheGame
Facebook: https://facebook.com/ElroyTheGame

Design & Development: Motiviti Games
Music: Epix Productions
